about_the_game:
What do a birthday party, a king’s dining room and a restaurant have in common? They all call for stunning food, well arranged on the best plates available and ready to let your taste buds tingle!

With the Meal Time pack there won’t be an empty table left in your game, unless you really want it to be. Filled with mouth watering goods, this set has everything your heroes could be craving for. Be it a rustic homemade pie from your main character's grandmother or a three course meal, starting with a delicious vegetable soup, followed by a sushi platter and closing with a dessert of fruit, the possibilities are endless. And for your more adventurous gourmets there are also some more fantastic options available - are you brave enough to give the shark head a try? Do the faces on the vegetables keep you from trying them

This set contains a combined total of 128 types of dishes, drinks, and tableware matching a fantasy world setting, such as food platters, bar snacks, Chinese-styled dishes, and fantasy monster dishes.

This tile set shall give your tavern and dining scene feel a more unique and vivid atmosphere!

Features:

Cooking tile set 1 sheet (128 types)

　-Platters x 8 types
　-Large skewers x 8 types
　-Chinese-style dishes x 8
　-Soup (wooden plate) x 4
　-Pasta (wooden plate) x 4
　-Bread set x 4
　-Rice ball set x 4
　-Baked carbs x 4
　-Pizza - 4 types
　-Pies - 4 types
　-Quiche x 4
　-Platters of rice x 4
　-Starters x 4
　-Fruits x 6
　-Vegetables x 6
　-Beer x 4
　-Wine x 4
　-Woodenware x 4
　-Silverware x 4
　-Goldware x 4
　-Tea sets x 4
　-Fantasy dishes x 12
　-Desserts x 4
　-Failed dishes x 12

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

short_description: This is a tile set collection of LOTs of fantasy dishes! Why not get this to double the fun of creating a fantasy RPG tavern and dinner tables?
